Class BLFacadeImplementation

java.lang.Object
business.logic.BLFacadeImplementation
All Implemented Interfaces:
business.logic.BLFacade
public class BLFacadeImplementation
extends java.lang.Object
implements business.logic.BLFacade
It implements the business logic as a web service.

      This method creates a question for an event, with a question text and the minimum bet
      Specified by:
      createQuestion in interface business.logic.BLFacade
      Parameters:
      event - to which question is added
      question - text of the question
      betMinimum - minimum quantity of the bet
      Returns:
      the created question, or null, or an exception
      Throws:
      exceptions.EventFinished - if current data is after data of the event
      exceptions.QuestionAlreadyExist - if the same question already exists for the event
